name: Golden Gun
description:
Hey all!

Thought I'd make a  shooter with a twist - it's based on my favourite part of Goldeneye's multiplayer; the Golden Gun mode.  

Every year,  the elite from all armed forces gather to attend the Golden Gun tournament. Only catch is that everyone has a golden gun! One shot, one kill. 

Think you're good enough?

Pay what you like!

Enjoy :)

Mosquito Cocktail
Follow me and my crazy games on  Twitter:   @MosquitoDev
Check me out on the Web:  MosquitoCocktail.com
